sentences: He has been sound mixing since 1976 and specializes in balancing and recording the final soundtrack in its many formats for film, TV, and documentaries.
His first Union was as a transfer engineer, later a re-recording engineer, at DuArt Film Laboratories in New York City.
In 1988, Tavella joined Sound One where he built his reputation among clients such as Paul Schrader, Jim Jarmusch, Darren Aronofsky, Ric Burns, and Ken Burns.
In 2003, he won an Oscar for Best Sound Mixing and a BAFTA for best sound for the film Chicago.
He has worked on more than 180 films since 1981.
